sentences.sContent: He waded into the water to push the boat out.
sentences.sCn: 他蹚进水里把船推出来。

sentences.sContent: Sometimes they had to wade waist-deep through mud.
sentences.sCn: 有时他们得通过齐腰深的泥浆。

synos.tran: 跋涉；可涉水而过的地方

phrases.pCn: 涉水（泥泞等）；费力地做完；艰难地通过
精神饱满地开始；猛烈攻击
vt. 插手，介入；猛烈攻击

words.tran: [鸟] 涉禽；涉水者，跋涉者；长筒防水靴
涉水（wade的ing形式）；艰难地通过

trans.tranOther: to walk through water that is not deep
